subtitle: did you know in the dense rainforests of the Amazon where nature unfolds its secrets to those
patient enough to listen there exists a brew made from plant life known as awasa the name derived
from the queta language means Vine of the Soul or the phone call to God awasa was not only just an
ancient Brew of our ancestors but a bridge to the Ethereal realm and dimensions a key to unlock The
Whispers of our reality speak with ancestors and the mother goddess of the Multiverse and
most importantly a mirror to one's innermost self and Mission on this Earth after ingesting aasa in
the form of a brooded potion under the guidance of a shaman the DMT within your system will activate
your pineal gland facilitating the automatic release of your spirit from your physical body
this departure will lead you to a specific astral realm where you will encounter Vivid colors and
visuals that are Beyond human perception it is often reported that in this ethereal domain mother
Gaia May manifest herself appearing either as a woman or a tiger depending on one's individual
experience within this otherworldly realm you will find answers to the profound questions
that have occupied your thoughts throughout your life these Revelations will be conveyed
in a unique manner intrinsic to the spirit realm additionally you will encounter various entities
some of which radiate positivity while Others May exude negativity this environment will also offer
glimpses into your own life highlighting areas that require transformation for the betterment of
your soul it is here that you will confront what many refer to as their inner demons ultimately
enabling you to address and resolve them once and for all awasa has been a part of South American
indigenous culture for Millennia historians believe the practice of drinking ayua date
back over 5,000 years ago as ceramic vessels from ancient Ecuadorian tribes depict its ceremonial
consumption for the indigenous people of the Amazon iasa is more than a Sacrament it's a
teacher healer and guide to the universe's deepest Mysteries the preparation and consumption of this
Brew is sacred entrusted to spiritual shamans or aaas scos who act as mediators between the
spiritual world and our Earthly realm the shaman plays a Divine role as a physical incarnation of
your spiritual guide whose ancestors were said to have been trained in the Brewing of this mixture
and the ritualistic act of guiding Souls by ancient extraterrestrials that visited the
Earth long ago the Brew's primary ingredients are the banisteriopsis Capi Vine and the leaves of the
psychotria viridus plant the vine provides the MS Inhibitors necessary for the DMT in the leaves to
become orally active under the watchful eye of the shaman these ingredients are cleaned pounded and
boiled together in water for hours or even days resulting in a thick bitter tasting brown liquid
though aasa was traditionally used for religious and spiritual purposes by specific populations
it has recently gained Global recognition many now seek its potential to open their minds heal
from past traumas or simply experience a profound Journey unlike any of the human experiences while
some religious groups May view the iasa plant as malevolent or Unholy it's important to recognize
that humans have been conditioned over time to fear and distance themselves from Mother
Earth this fear and disconnection diminish our connection to the very planet that sustains us
which the creator of all universes created the Allure of the plant for spiritual Seekers has
caused many to travel to countries like Peru Costa Rica and Brazil for multi-day awasa
Retreats led by experienced shamans who ensure the participants safety however approach these
principles with caution the surge in popularity of the awasa experience has led some individuals in
various countries to exploit Believers deceiving any tourist in search of the awasa journey it's
advisable to seek recommendations for a reputable and well-intentioned Shaman or even consider the
annual iasa retreats in Western Arizona for a genuine and safe iasa experience prior preparation
is crucial participants are often advised to abstain from cigarettes drugs alcohol sex and
caffeine to purify their systems adopting specific diets such as vegetarianism or veganism 2 to 4
weeks before the ceremony is also frequently recommended to free the body of toxins it is
also important to be fully positive in mindset and mentally prepared since the psychoactive effects
can you put into a visually altered state where your soul physically transports to the spiritual
realm and your mind is fully conscious of it physical manifestations like nausea or Tremors
might be experienced viewed by many as a necessary release of negative energies aasa ceremonies
traditionally occur at night participants sit in a circle in a space treated with reverence
Guided by the shaman who may sing EOS sacred songs that summon spirits and guide the journey each
individual embarks on their unique Voyage after consuming The Brew the journey with iasa can be
intensely personal some MIT Traverse galaxies meet ancient Spirits converse with extraterrestrials
visit planets or gain insights into personal questions or traumas it is even known that most
meet with the spiritual being known as mother awasa in these Visionary Journeys she is often
perceived as a wise nurturing sometimes challenging and always profoundly powerful
presence many describe her as embodying the spirit or consciousness of the aasa plant itself she may
come in the appearance of a beautiful physical snake woman or even as a unique blue greenish
tiger it is said once people encounter mother ayusa their lives change significantly and they
realize who they are emerging from this dreamlike state often brings Newfound Clarity relationships
might be re-evaluated personal traumas that might find closure or life's purpose might resonate
more clearly popularly Steve Jobs the founder and creator creator of Apple was said to have visited
India and Peru and consumed not only psychoactive drugs like assed but participated with iasa as
well however aasa's power demands respect it's not a journey for everyone and its deep effects
warrant careful consideration since it is meant only for Spiritual use and not Recreation to
not feed into this tenet can lead to mental instability like with any substance on Earth
supervision by experienced shamans is Paramount ensuring a safe setting and time for post ceremony
reflection and integration in essence aasa stands as a testament to ancient wisdom and mother nature
a beacon for modern spiritual Seekers and an intriguing portal to the vast mysteries
of existence if you like this video please like And subscribe to astral Legends for more ancient
